name: Snake Chef
description:
Snake Chef is a game which takes the classic Snake game, and add a twist on it.

You are a proud snake chef, use all of your skills to create the orders from your customers, and prepare delicious recipes.

This game is an entry for the 8 Bits to Infinity Easy Jam. And was built using Flame. Web support on it is very beta and experimental, so beware that this game is pretty much a prototype, and random crashes will probably happen.

Musics made by Fabri
